featured.text: It was in the 19th century that the magician Robert Houdin came along and changed people’s views and attitudes about magic.
It was also because of Robert Houdin that many magicians were able to add Dr. or MD to their names.

definition.zh_def: 一種魔術表演，特別是指逃脫術，源自著名魔術師哈利·胡迪尼的名字。
definition.en_def: A type of magic performance, particularly referring to escape artistry, named after the famous magician Harry Houdini.
definition.example: The magician's houdin act left the audience in awe as he escaped from the locked box.
